overview: In the 1995 film TWISTER, Bill Paxton's character is known by colleagues as "The Extreme," and one of his most extreme encounters with a tornado involves throwing a bottle of whiskey into itâ€”and the bottle never touching the ground. Joe believes this makes Paxton the toughest tough guy in all of moviedom. Jacob has a few counter-arguments. Eventually The Extreme himself shows up to settle the debate...
title: The Dude from Twister
